data.name: A game that saves the muscles caught in the ceiling of the gymnasium
data.detailed_description:
"Game to save muscles caught on the ceiling of the gymnasium" is a new kind of shooting game where you have to hit a man caught on the ceiling of the gymnasium with a ball to rescue him.

As you know, many machos are caught on the beams near the ceiling of the gymnasium. I don't know why these half-naked machos are trapped in the gymnasium ceiling. Players hit them with a special macho rescue ball in the shape of a volleyball, shock them and drop them off the ceiling.

■ Game features
There are two types of game modes that you can play.
  • In "Rescue Mode" you can rescue Macho until you are satisfied with unlimited time. Rescue and collect the occasional "rare macho".
  • "Challenge mode" is a time attack mode that measures how quickly you can rescue 10 machos within the time limit.

data.short_description: This is a new type of shooting game in which the player rescues muscular trapped in the ceiling of a gymnasium by hitting them with a ball.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 OR AMD RX 5500
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 OR AMD RX 5600 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
